data.text: Esia nye nya si va na Yeremia tso Yehowa gbɔ.
“Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la gblɔe nye esi: ‘Ŋlɔ nya siwo katã megblɔ na wò la ɖe agbalẽ me’
Yehowa be, ‘Ŋkekewo li gbɔna, esi makplɔ nye dukɔwo Israel kple Yuda agbɔe tso aboyo me, eye magbugbɔ anyigba si metsɔ na wo fofowo be wòanye wo tɔ la na wo.’ ” Yehowa gblɔe.
Nya siawoe Yehowa gblɔ tso Israel kple Yuda ŋuti.
“Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Bia eye nàkpɔe ɖa be,
Alele, anye ŋkeke dziŋɔ
Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la be,
Ke boŋ woasubɔ Yehowa,
“Eya ta mègavɔ̃ o. O, nye dɔla Yakob.
Meli kpli wò be maɖe wò.”
“Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Ame aɖeke meli aʋli tawò o,
Wò lɔlɔ̃tɔwo katã ŋlɔ wò be,
Nu ka ŋutie nèle avi fam tso wò abi
“ ‘Gake ame siwo katã vuvu wò la woavuvu wo,
Ke mana nàhaya, eye mana wò abiawo naku,
“Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Kafukafuha kple aseyetsogbe aɖi tso wo dome.
Wo viwo anɔ abe le blema ƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me ene
Woƒe kplɔla anye woawo ŋutɔ dometɔ ɖeka
Ale be mianye nye dukɔ
Kpɔ ɖa, Yehowa ƒe ahom atu sesĩe
Yehowa ƒe dziku dziŋɔ la matrɔ adzo o,
